job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Staffing and Recruiting,Financial Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: Selby Jennings is working with a high level banking institution to find the best technology talent to build their FinTech team. They have multiple teams hiring for various roles with full-time opportunities. Read below for the responsibilities and qualifications of the role to see if it’s a good fit for you. Responsibilities:Own your system as you write new code/APIs and have a large impact on different productsEntrepreneurial approach to problem solving and solution developmentAssist in defining the technical architecture of mission critical systemsFind and implement new technology and research to further develop the systems you’ve createdQualifications:Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or relevant fieldAt least 1-6 years of experience as a professional software engineerMastery of Java technologiesStrong understanding of modern software architectureExperience with full-stack JS, React, Node.js, and othersOthers to be considered:AWS experienceBig data technology experience (kafka or hadoop)Previous financial experienceMade it this far? Take the time to apply and submit your resume!
